answers.answer: I don't see any problem,  HOWEVER,  I am not your doctor and I can't give you treatment advice.  You should call your physician.  These type of drugs can affect the circulation in the eye - but a pvd is really  not a circulatory problem.  I understand they can cause blurred vision and color vision changes.MJK MD

question: I'm a 46 male and have a PVD in the left eye @ 1 year ago. It completely detached and in a few weeks, the line and floaters went a away ( mostly ). I have no other issue ie. diabetes, pressure, glaucoma. Is it dangerous to use drugs like Cialis or Viagra with a PVD?
title: PVD- Cialis/Viagra
